description: Detects omission, minimization, or misrepresentation of the mass internment of Japanese-Americans during World War II.
core_pattern: Framing the internment as necessary wartime security rather than racial discrimination and constitutional violation.
flags: Use of the term 'relocation centers' without context
Omission of loss of land, property, or due process
Justifying actions without including redress/apology history
consequence: Weakens understanding of civil liberties under duress and normalizes ethnonationalist scapegoating.
activation_contexts: Pattern recognition of racialized state actions
